test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Load and Basic Navigation
steps: Click on a main category link (e.g., Women, Men, Kids).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads without errors. Category page loads successfully.

test_scenarios.name: Search for a Product and View Product Details
steps: Enter a search term (e.g., 'dress') in the search bar.
Select one of the product in the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results are displayed. Product details page loads successfully.

test_scenarios.name: Add Product to Bag
steps: Navigate to a product details page.
Select a size and color (if applicable).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Product is added to the shopping bag. A confirmation message is displayed or bag icon updates to reflect addition.

test_scenarios.name: Proceed to Checkout
steps: Navigate to the shopping bag page.
Click on 'Checkout' or a similar button leading to the checkout process.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is redirected to the checkout page (guest checkout or login).

test_scenarios.name: Create a New Account
steps: Navigate to the account creation page (e.g., 'Sign Up').
Enter valid email, password and other required personal details.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Account is created successfully. User is logged in or receives a verification email.
